summary: THE HEAD GASKET HAD TO BE REPLACED.  FORD RECALLED THE 95 MODELS AND WILL NOT HONOR THE 96 MODELS.  THERE WAS AN INADEQUATE PERFORMANCE AND ABNORMAL ENGINE COOLANT TEMPERATURE INDICATIONS, COOLANT LEAKED FROM THE HEAD GASKET AND CAUSED THE ENGINE TO OVERHEAT.  THE DEALER MISDIAGNOSED THE PROBLEM AND CAUSED THE CONSUMER SPEND MORE MONEY.  THE CONSUMER REQUESTED A REFUND FOR THE REPAIR COST.  *MR
